sentences.english: Children ask a seemingly never-ending stream of questions from an early age.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们从很小时就开始问一连串似乎永无止境的问题。

sentences.english: We feel the long pulsation, ebb and flow of endless motion.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到长久的悸动，和永无止境的潮起潮落。

sentences.english: The moon night is my endless tears.
sentences.chinese: 月夜是我永无止境的泪水。

sentences.english: There is still a period of life and a never-ending journey away, when to finish?
sentences.chinese: 还有一段又一段永无止境的路程，什么时候结束？

sentences.english: The ebb and flow of Creation is never-ending.
sentences.chinese: 在潮起潮落的创作是永无止境的。

sentences.english: India has two aspects--in one she is a householder, in the other a wandering ascetic.
sentences.chinese: 印度于我犹如房主，又如一段永无止境的漫长修行。
冥想是永无止境的运动。

sentences.english: It is the certain result of our personals' pioneering and pursuing for perfection's spirit.
sentences.chinese: 它就是佳宝人开拓进取永无止境的一个必然的结果。

sentences.english: As the morning mist rises, the Australian rain forest appears never-ending.
sentences.chinese: 晨雾缭绕的时候，澳洲雨林似乎永无止境。

sentences.english: Live every day of your life as though you expect to live forever.
sentences.chinese: 每天你应抱著永无止境的希望生活下去。

sentences.english: Of course, it's an endless arms race.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这是一场永无止境的军备竞赛。

sentences.english: Shallow by Into Eternity, from their album Dead or Dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 从他们的专辑“死或梦，由永无止境浅层。

sentences.english: This engagement is no end in itself.
sentences.chinese: 这种参与接触是永无止境的。

sentences.english: But Easterlin's evidence points to the persistence of materialism.
sentences.chinese: 但伊斯特林的论证却指出人类的物欲永无止境。

definition: lit. diligent and never slacking (idiom); continuous concentrated effort/assiduous (in study)/to concentrate
to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
lit. the cycle comes back to the start (idiom); to move in circles/the wheel comes full circle
to grow and multiply without end
to search for sth/to seek/to quest/to explore
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
